\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 82391}

\subsection*{Great for Relaxation}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Lesserthanyou}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 75 mg & oral & Pharms - Chlordiazepoxide & capsule\\
\hline
 T+ 0:30 & 25 mg & oral & Pharms - Chlordiazepoxide & capsule\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 125.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I recently obtained four 25mg librium capsules from a friend. Here's my experience.



t00:00- Three 25mg capsules ingested 



t00:15-Feeling of relaxation, chalked off to placebo.



t00:30-More relaxation, my bed feels amazing. Finding it very hard to walk. Not a care in the world. I wanna see how far I can take this so I took a fourth pill equaling 100 mg.



t00:45-Really no effect from the 4th pill. Starting to come down.



t1:00-Normality restored.



Overall this is a great drug for relaxing.

\end{document}
